Name: Diomar
description:
Diomar is a friendly merchant from Popayan, Cauca, with over four years of experience. She operates a stand at the local plaza, where she offers a wide range of fresh fruits and vegetables sourced from local farmers, ensuring the freshness of her products and supporting the regional economy by promoting sustainable trade.

Diomar is a single mother who lives with her two children in a house she purchased several years ago. Her children attend the local school, and Diomar is committed to supporting them through her business.

A loan of 3,797,871 COP allows Diomar to purchase new merchandise for her stand. This investment will help her expand her product range, attract more customers, and increase her sales.
